name: Nyan-chan Does Rythym
description:
Didn't have time to include a main menu or multiple songs so, hope you enjoy chiptune! Press any key to start the song. I do not have access to Mac or Linux so I can't guarantee the stability of those builds.

Try to get the highest score possible, and I hope you enjoy!

Instructions:

"a" and "d" control left notes, left arrow key and right arrow key control right notes

Escape to bring up the pause menu

Credits:

Song is Level 1 by HoliznaCC0
